entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 9:49 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
